targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM by_country_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "country_isocode"
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE install_version !~ /v2(.*)/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),status
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE install_version =~ /v2(.*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),status
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM by_country_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "country"
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),install_version
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval),install_version
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE   install_version !~ /v2(.*)/
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND   install_version !~ /v2(.*)/  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("running") FROM containers_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") FROM containers_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("host") FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("windows") FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cpu") FROM hosts_1h WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("memory") FROM hosts_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("kubernetes")  FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("swarm")  FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("mesos")  FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cattle") as cattle FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("cattle") + sum("kubernetes")  + sum("mesos") + sum("swarm") + sum("windows") FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("active") FROM stacks_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") FROM services_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("active") FROM services_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("cattle") as cattle, sum("kubernetes") as kubernetes, sum("mesos") as mesos, sum("swarm") as swarm, sum("windows") as windows FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("total") FROM stacks_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count(distinct("uid")) as total FROM byUid_$agg_time WHERE  install_version !~ /v2(.*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),status

SELECT sum("kubernetes") AS "kubernetes", sum("mesos") AS "mesos", sum("swarm") AS "swarm", sum("windows") AS "windows", sum("cattle") AS "cattle" 
FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT sum("kubernetes") AS "kubernetes", sum("mesos") AS "mesos", sum("swarm") AS "swarm", sum("windows") AS "windows", sum("cattle") AS "cattle" 
FROM orchestrators_$agg_time WHERE $timeFilter AND status = 'new' GROUP BY time($interval)
